member.name: T:Channel.Dtos.Orders.ExecutionStrategy
member.summary: Specifies how an order will be executed

member.name: F:Channel.Dtos.Orders.ExecutionStrategy.REQUEST_FOR_QUOTE
member.summary: RequestEnvelope a guaranteed price for an instrument RFQs are time-limited and must be executed prior to expiry

member.name: F:Channel.Dtos.Orders.ExecutionStrategy.BEST_EXECUTION
member.summary: Ask that the order be fulfilled at the current market rate The order may be fulfilled in single or multiple parts spread over a time period according to the execution policy Slicing comments can be added to the order

member.summary: you are selling this
